card.name: Station Ticket-Taker
card.text: When Station Ticket-Taker enters, you may search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, shuffle, then put it into your hand or on top of your library. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library if you put it into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Scavenging Prowler
card.text: Prowess 3B/G, Exile Scavenging Prowler from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Taraikyo Thunder Artist
card.text: First strike Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Taraikyo Thunder Artist deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Blastbreath Elder
card.text: Menace Valiant — Whenever Blastbreath Elder becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Guardian Ushi-Oni
card.text: Trample When Guardian Ushi-Oni enters, up to one [target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.] Paradigm shift {B} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {B})

card.name: Trigger Discipline
card.text: Trigger Discipline deals 2 damage to any nonplayer target. If you’ve cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn, Trigger Discipline deals 4 damage instead.

card.name: Reckless Revelries
card.text: Choose one — • Reckless Revelries deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

Battle Spirit
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Just as Taught
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if {G} was spent to cast this spell. Then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Soul Spite
card.text: Choose one — • Soul Spite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Ardent Novelist

card.name: Rebellious Maiko
card.text: Vigilance Spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Regal Teacher
card.text: Regal Teacher has first strike as long as it’s attacking. Whenever you draw a card, except for the first card you have drawn this turn, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Do this only once each turn.

card.text: Choose one — • Hitori’s Fragmentation deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature.

card.text: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Binding Prank
card.text: Binding Prank has ward {2} as long as you control a Spirit. When Binding Prank enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Binding Prank leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Slip on the Mask
card.text: Target creature you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Serpentine Companion

card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control. They each deal damage equal to their power to target creature you don’t control.

card.text: Mill four cards. Then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. 3G, Exile Spiritual Connection and a creature card from your graveyard: You gain life equal to the exiled creature’s power.

card.name: Stir the Pot
card.text: Choose one or three — • Target opponent loses 3 life. • Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Lively Snapshot
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Spirit card and/or a card with mana value 4 or greater from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Kazue, Rebellious Beat
card.text: First strike, haste Whenever Kazue, Rebellious Beat attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the number of Stations you control from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Leading Swordmaster
card.text: First strike Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, [creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.] Other creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. Paradigm shift {R} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {R})

card.name: Angel's Resolve
card.text: Choose one or three — • Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. • Sacrifice a creature. Angel’s Resolve deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature’s power to any target. • Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Consuming Ignition
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. You may cast Consuming Ignition from your graveyard as long as it targets a creature that was the target of a spell or ability you controlled this turn. If cast this way, it enters with a finality counter.

card.name: Standing Force
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard. Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Herald of Life's Tenacity
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature gets +X/+X as long as it’s attacking, where X is the greatest base power and/or toughness among other creatures you control.

card.name: Wayward Behemoth
card.text: Wayward Behemoth’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.

card.name: Tetsushika Titan
card.text: Trample When Tetsushika Titan attacks, another [target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.] If it’s a spirit, put a +1/+1 counter on it and Tetsushika Titan. Paradigm shift {W} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {W})

card.name: Alissa, Rogue Element
card.text: Flash Deathtouch Instant spells and spells with flash you cast cost {1} less to cast and can’t be countered.

card.name: Helios Ignition
card.text: Helios Ignition deals 2 damage to any target. Up to one target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Student Council Enforcer
card.text: Whenever you draw a card other than the first card you draw each turn, create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.

card.name: Naoko, the Hopestruck
card.text: Vigilance When Naoko, the Hopestruck enters, you may discard a card. If you do, conjure two cards named Fatigue into your hand. (They’re colorless sorceries that cost {2} with “Draw a card.”) {T}: Add CC. Activate only if you’ve drawn two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Experiment Zero-One
card.text: Experiment Zero-One enters with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you conjure one or more cards, put a +1/+1 counter on Experiment Zero-One. If damage would be done to Experiment Zero-One while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Shrine Shadowspear
card.text: Menace Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Inami, Taraikyo Star
card.text: Valiant — Whenever Inami, Taraikyo Star becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, if you don’t control a creature named Benkei, create Benkei, a legendary 4/3 colorless Cat Construct artifact creature token with haste and “at the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature”, then copy that spell or ability. That copy must target Benkei.

card.name: Center of Performance
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability you control it gains your choice of trample, haste, vigilance, lifelink, double strike or menace until end of turn.

card.name: Backstage Film Crew
card.text: First strike, vigilance Valiant — Whenever Backstage Film Crew becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Gates of Mist
card.text: {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Gates of Mist: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards exiled with Gates of Mist. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mysterious Notebook
card.text: When Mysterious Notebook enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Notebook: Add three mana of different colors.

card.name: Ogura, Accursed Sukeban
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+0. Whenever Ogura, Accursed Sukeban or another creature you control enters, if it entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, create a 2/1 black and red Rogue creature token with haste.

card.name: Inugami Twins
card.text: Instruct (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Double strike

card.name: Eidros, Lost Anomaly
card.text: Flying When Eidros, Lost Anomaly enters, [it deals 2 damage to each other creature.] If you control three or more Stations, it deals 2 damage to each creature you don’t control instead. Paradigm shift 2R (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 2R)

card.name: Kotobuki of Lost Fury
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant card, sorcery card and card with paradigm shift in your graveyard. Flying When Kotobuki of Lost Fury enters, you may have it deal damage to any nonplayer target equal to the number of instant cards, sorcery cards and cards with paradigm shift in your graveyard.

card.name: Taraikyo Stage-Maiden
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color. {T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Terminal Encounters
card.text: Enchant land When Terminal Encounters enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. If enchanted land is a Station, draw a card instead. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Enchanted land has “{T}: Add two mana of different colors.”

card.name: Adoration Campaign
card.text: Flash When Adoration Campaign enters, you draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life. Whenever you cast an instant spell or spell with flash, you may return Adoration Campaign to your hand.

card.name: Urban Huntress
card.text: Flash Whenever Urban Huntress deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Erratic Pilot
card.text: Flash When Erratic Pilot enters, you may pay 2 life. If you do, [Surveil 2, then draw a card.] Paradigm shift 1U (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1U)

card.name: Strategist's Uplink
card.text: Flash When Strategist’s Uplink enters, return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Whenever you cast an instant spell, or a spell with flash, scry 1.

card.name: Wani Rescuer
card.text: Flash When Wani Rescuer enters, return up to one other target permanent you control with flash to its owner’s hand. Whenever you cast an instant spell or a spell with flash, tap or untap target nonland permanent.

card.name: Heikegani's Heir
card.text: Prowess Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1.

card.name: Down With Me
card.text: Creatures you control have prowess. Whenever a creature you control dies, if its power was greater than it’s base power, it deals damage equal to the difference to any target.

card.name: Shot Through the Heart
card.text: Damage can’t be prevented this turn. Shot Through the Heart deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Security Proxy
card.text: Vigilance {T}, Sacrifice Security Proxy: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Unlimiter Bracers
Lethal Confrontation
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 1B or exile a card named Fatigue from your graveyard. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: War-Stage Idol
card.text: Whenever War-Stage Idol enters or attacks, you may sacrifice another artifact or creature. If you do, you [draw two cards and create a Treasure token.] Paradigm shift 2R, Discard a card. (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for it’s paradigm shift cost.)

card.name: Seijuku Aerial Guard
card.text: Flying Whenever you spend 4 or more mana to cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If 6 or more mana was spent to cast it, [put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control] instead. Paradigm shift 1W (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1W)

card.name: Haiden Nurturer
card.text: Whenever Haiden Nurturer enters or you draw a card beyond the first card you have drawn this turn, you may [tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.] Paradigm shift 1U (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1U)

card.name: Onnagata Consecrator
card.text: If you control a Spirit, you may pay 1W rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. Vigilance Other spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: After-Class Club
card.text: When After-Class Club enters, choose up to one — • Exile target artifact or enchantment. • Exile target player’s graveyard. • Exile target tapped creature.

card.name: Stationside Performers
Deep Studies Teacher
card.text: When Deep Studies Teacher enters, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you spend 4 or more mana to cast a spell, if Deep Studies Teacher isn’t a token, create a token that’s a copy of it.

card.name: Hollow Reclamation
card.text: Choose target nonland permanent you don’t control. Its controller creates an X/X colorless Void Horror creature token if you don’t control a permanent with greater mana value, where X is the target’s mana value, then gain control of it.

card.name: Memory's Flow Kotobuki
card.text: Flying When Memory’s Flow Kotobuki enters, each opponent mills four cards, then [conjure a duplicate of up to X cards in target opponent’s graveyard into your hand,] Where X is the number of cards you have drawn this turn. Paradigm shift XXB (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for XXB)

card.name: Hellraisers Outrider
card.text: Haste Hellraisers Outrider can’t block 4R, Exile any number of other cards from your graveyard: Return Hellraisers Outrider from your graveyard to the battlefield. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each card exiled to activate it.

card.name: Retrofitted Artillery
Orochi Ambush
card.text: Create a 4/4 green Snake Spirit creature token with reach. {G}, Exile Orochi Ambush from your graveyard: Create a 4/4 green Snake Spirit creature token with reach. Activate only if you’ve spent 4 or more mana to cast a spell not named Orochi Ambush this turn.

card.name: Hinotori-Blessed Tracker
card.text: Trample, haste Valiant — Whenever Hinotori-Blessed Tracker becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on Hinotori-Blessed Tracker. If you don’t, you may play the exiled card until end of turn.

card.name: Battle-Tested Maid
card.text: Flash Whenever you cast your first instant spell or spell with flash each turn, [look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.] Paradigm shift {U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {U})

card.name: Dramatis Personae
card.text: Search your library for a card and exile it, then shuffle. If it’s an equipment, put it into your hand, otherwise you may cast it for as long as it remains exiled if it targets a creature you control.

card.name: Void Central Junction
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. --- Choose a basic land type. This tale’s source gains that type. (this effect lasts indefinitely)

card.name: Dream Big Dreams
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order, then you may put a permanent from your hand with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand onto the battlefield.
